name: Rebel Trooper Recruit
Lore: 'New Rebel troopers gain invaluable experience while acting as support for seasoned troops. The Alliance prefers to assign rookies to soldiers on a one-to-one basis.',
Text: 'Deploys free to same site as an Rebel leader. Adds 1 to power of one non-unique Rebel warrior present. When forfeited at same site as a Rebel ''veteran'' (a leader or non-cadet trooper), also satisfies all remaining attrition against you.',
